description: For a healthier lunch option, try this cottage cheese and roast vegetable salad.
name: Cottage Cheese and Roast Veg Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup sweet potato, peeled and diced
0.5 cup small carrot, peeled and diced
40g red capsicum, thinly sliced and deseeded

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat an oven to 160 C. Place pumpkin, sweet potatoes and carrots on a piece of baking paper, drizzle with the oil and season, cook until tender and caramelised.
Add zucchini, gently tossing through and cook a further 8 minutes.
Let cool for a few minutes, then start plating. First Dot with the cottage cheese. Next add the avocado slices, olives, onion, capsicum and tomatoes
Mix the soy, ginger, garlic and lime zest and juice and pour evenly over the salad, sprinkle with chilli flakes and spring onion slices, season and enjoy.
